Cities of Serberistan

Across the continent lay the 7 Great Cities. The oldest and Grandest of these are the rival cities of Paterdoma and Vantocar. Spread across the nation are 5 smaller cities, Surniam, Iliamna, Alakan, Elsamera, Dragnara. Surrounding these 7 cities are smaller villages and towns, many lay empty since the fall of the 3rd age. Some still maintain a permanent population, while others serve as a shelter for the traveling Sansuvut Nomads. These cities typically lay a day or two's walk from each other, lending travelers a place to rest safely as they make their pilgrimages across Serberistan.
